_metadata.title: Information Barriers - Policies
_metadata.description: Creates Information Barrier policies that block communication and collaboration between defined organizational segments. Prevents Research from communicating with Trading (Chinese wall), and Trading from communicating with Board members to comply with insider trading regulations and conflict of interest requirements.

prerequisites: Connect to Security & Compliance PowerShell: Connect-IPPSSession
Organizational segments must be created first (PV20)
Information Barriers mode must be enabled: Set-OrganizationConfig -InformationBarrierMode Enabled
Azure AD Department attributes must be populated for all in-scope users
Legal and Compliance teams must approve the barrier definitions before deployment
Allow up to 24 hours for policy application to propagate across all workloads
deploymentSteps: 1. Verify segments are created and active (PV20): Get-OrganizationSegment
3. Create the Research-Trading barrier policy using New-InformationBarrierPolicy
4. Create the Trading-Board barrier policy using New-InformationBarrierPolicy
8. Validate barriers by testing communication between blocked segments
9. Allow up to 24 hours for full propagation across Exchange, Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive
_notes.rollbackProcedure: Set-InformationBarrierPolicy -Identity '<PolicyName>' -State Inactive for each policy, then run Start-InformationBarrierPoliciesApplication to apply the change. Policies can be deactivated without deletion.

parameters.Name: PV21-IB-Block-Research-Trading
parameters.Comment: Chinese wall policy: blocks all communication and collaboration between Research and Trading segments to prevent insider trading and comply with DORA, NYDFS, and MiFID II requirements.

parameters.Name: PV21-IB-Block-Trading-Research
parameters.Comment: Reciprocal Chinese wall policy: blocks Trading segment from communicating with Research. Information Barriers require bidirectional policies for full enforcement.

parameters.Name: PV21-IB-Block-Trading-Board
parameters.Comment: Blocks Trading segment from communicating with Board members to prevent MNPI (Material Non-Public Information) leakage and insider trading risks.

parameters.Name: PV21-IB-Block-Board-Trading
parameters.Comment: Reciprocal policy: blocks Board members from communicating with Trading segment. Required for bidirectional Information Barrier enforcement.

applyPolicies._note: Triggers the application of all active Information Barrier policies. Processing may take up to 24 hours to complete across all workloads.

verifyApplication._note: Check the status of policy application. Status should be 'Completed' before validating barriers.

informationBarrierPolicies.description: Chinese wall: Research cannot communicate with or discover Trading users
Trading cannot communicate with or discover Board members
